revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Oreburgh Gate |image = [[File:Oreburgh Gate.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Oreburgh Gate. |tokens = 39,000 |location = North of Route 203, northwest of Oreburgh City. }} '''Oreburgh Gate''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 720,600 HP.
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || rowspan=3 | <center> [[File:Camper.png|40px]] Camper Curtis || rowspan=3|<center>[[File:Starly.png|40px]] Starly, [[File:Shinx.png|40px]] Shinx |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude || rowspan=4 | <center> [[File:Picnicker.png|40px]] Picnicker Diana || rowspan=4|<center>[[File:Bidoof.png|40px]] Bidoof |- | [[File:Golduck.png|40px]] Golduck |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Barboach.png|40px]] Barboach |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Alola, the drop chance for items in Sinnoh will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
